38 // See: http://www.opengl-tutorial.org/intermediate-tutorials/billboards-particles/billboards/
39 enum class GlyphMode {
40  kGUI = 0, // 2D elements on a menu, always in screen space
41  kBillboard // 2D Element specified in world-space
42 };
43 
45 enum class BillboardFlag : unsigned int {
46  kScale = 1, // Scale with zoom, i.e. if on, glyph is constant screen size
47  kFaceCamera = 2, // Always face camera
48  kAlwaysOnTop = 4, // Render on top of all components
49 };
50

86  Flags<BillboardFlag>& flags() { return m_flags; }
87 
88  bool scalesWithDistance() const {
89  return m_flags.testFlag(BillboardFlag::kScale);
90  }
91  void setScaleWithDistance(bool scale) {
92  m_flags.setFlag(BillboardFlag::kScale, scale);
93  }
94  bool facesCamera() const {
95  return m_flags.testFlag(BillboardFlag::kFaceCamera);
96  }
97  void setFaceCamera(bool face) {
98  m_flags.setFlag(BillboardFlag::kFaceCamera, face);
99  }
100  bool alwaysOnTop() const {
101  return m_flags.testFlag(BillboardFlag::kAlwaysOnTop);
102  }
103  void setOnTop(bool onTop) {
104  m_flags.setFlag(BillboardFlag::kAlwaysOnTop, onTop);
105  }
